title: IoT-Based Safe with Fingerprint Sensor
description: A safe system using fingerprint, keypad, and GPS tracker.

description: Safe system that sends alerts via Telegram using ESP32-CAM.
detailedDescription: Includes backup battery power and remote notification functionality using Telegram bot integration.
